com.github.essobedo.appma.task

Class TaskProgressFX<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.essobedo.appma.task.TaskProgress
      • com.github.essobedo.appma.task.TaskProgressFX<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The return type of the task.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    TaskObserver, Observer

    public abstract class TaskProgressFX<T>
extends TaskProgress
    The root class of the TaskObserver in case of a Java FX application.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    $Id$
    Author:
    Nicolas Filotto (nicolas.filotto@gmail.com)

        Description copied from interface: TaskObserver
        Notifies that the current progress of the task has changed.
        Parameters:
        done - the work already done.
        max - the maximum work to be done.

      • execute

        public final T execute()
                throws ApplicationException,
                       TaskInterruptedException
        Executes the underlying task.
        Returns:
        the result of the task.
        Throws:
        ApplicationException - if an error occurs while executing the task.
        TaskInterruptedException - if the task has been interrupted.
